circumstances: During the takeoff roll at Pecos Airport, the pilot lost control of the airplane swerved and eventually crashed. The aircraft was destroyed by a post crash fire and all three occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
The pilot failed to maintain directional control during takeoff. The following factors were reported:
- Attempted operation beyond experience and ability level, 
- Lack of familiarity with aircraft,
- Exceeded design stress limits of aircraft,
- Failed to follow approved procedures, 
- Exercised poor judgment.
